Package geneticAlgorithm

Class GeneticAlgorithm

java.lang.Object
geneticAlgorithm.GeneticAlgorithm
public final class GeneticAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object
Represent the geneticAlgorithm.GeneticAlgorithm class where it demonstrates the basic structure of a genetic algorithm with mutation, crossover and evolution.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Chromosome<Letter> crossOverChromosome​(Chromosome chromosome1, Chromosome chromosome2)
    This method applies core principle of Genetic Algorithm where it switches parts of the given chromosomes and return a new, combined chromosome.
    Population evolve​(Population population, AbstractLetterFactory langType)  
    static GeneticAlgorithm getInstance()
    This function demonstrates the Singleton pattern applied to genetic algorithm.
    Chromosome mutateChromosome​(Chromosome chromosome, AbstractLetterFactory langType)  

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static GeneticAlgorithm getInstance()
      This function demonstrates the Singleton pattern applied to genetic algorithm. With it's use in mutation and crossover singleton pattern applied for memory optimization purposes.
      Returns:
      returns a geneticAlgorithm.Population type.

    • evolve

      public Population evolve​(Population population, AbstractLetterFactory langType)
      Parameters:
      population - a population to evolve and get the best generation.
      Returns:
      population object that has mutated and some parts have been subject to crossover.

    • mutateChromosome

      public Chromosome mutateChromosome​(Chromosome chromosome, AbstractLetterFactory langType)
      Parameters:
      chromosome - one of the main characteristics of GA is to mutating a chromose, where with a random chance of getting mutated, some parts will be changed in the chromosome with a random letter.
      Returns:
      mutateChromosome object with the tyoe ıf geneticAlgorithm.Chromosome.

    • crossOverChromosome

      public Chromosome<Letter> crossOverChromosome​(Chromosome chromosome1, Chromosome chromosome2)
      This method applies core principle of Genetic Algorithm where it switches parts of the given chromosomes and return a new, combined chromosome.
      Parameters:
      chromosome1 - a chromosome to get some part of it and combine.
      chromosome2 - a chromosome to get some part of it and combine.
      Returns:
      geneticAlgorithm.Chromosome type object.
